info.title: Sales Legacy API v1
info.description: Legacy v1 Platform API endpoints for sales domain including payments, invoices, estimates, packages, and lead generation

parameters.description: A unique identifer of the business. Can be the Business UID or nickname\external ID
parameters.name: X-On-Behalf-Of

business_id.description: A unique identifier of the business. Can be the Business UID or nickname\external ID.

email.description: Lead email address. Unique per business.

first_name.description: Lead first name. Mandatory for a new lead.

identifier_type.description: Defines which unique identifier will be used to search for an existing lead or create a new one. Possible values: "email" or "unique_id"

message_data.description: Key and value that will appear in message

notifications.description: A list of notifications to send after processing of the lead. Possible values: "auto-reply" (thank you email to the end user), "email" (notify the business owner) or "sms" (text notification to the business owner). None if empty.

opt_in.description: Send "true" if lead opted in for promotions. Make sure the "opt-in" client card field is added to the client card under Settings>Client card.

opt_in_transactional_sms.description: Whether the client opts in to receive transactional SMS messages.

request_data.description: Key and value properties that will update new lead and appear in message

request_title.description: Request title. Will also be the created conversation title.

source.description: Will be displayed to the business owner as the lead source

source_url.description: The URL of the page where the lead was created.

status.description: Use a client status to categorize clients according to their relationship with your business, default is Lead.

system_message.description: A message displayed to the business owner to introduce the lead. May contain links.

tags.description: Customized labels that enbale you to sort your data using personalized words, phrases or themes that are meaningful to you and your business

unique_id.description: Lead unique id. Unique per business.

post.description:
## Overview
Creates a lead Available for **Staff, App, and Directory tokens**.

parameters.description:
Available filters: state: filter[state][in]=paid,pending,failed,refunded,cancelled,archived,incompleted.
                                                                                           created_at: filter[created_at][eq/lt/lte/gt/gte]=2023-01-01 or 2023-01-01 09:30:00.
                                                                                           updated_at: filter[updated_at][eq/lt/lte/gt/gte]=2023-01-01 or 2023-01-01 09:30:00.
                                                                                           client_id: filter[client_id][eq]=client_id.
                                                                                           invoice_id: filter[invoice_id][eq]=invoice_id.
parameters.name: filter

parameters.description:
Sort by one of the following: created_at, updated_at.
                                                                      Available operators: asc, desc.
                                                                      Example: sort=created_at:asc,updated_at:desc
parameters.name: sort

get.description:
## Overview
Get Payments List. Available for **Staff Tokens**.

## Prerequisites
The business must have the `payments_module` feature enabled.

mark_as_online.description: Enable online refund. Default is disabled

payment_subject_id.description: The ID of the entity for which the payment has been made

payment_subject_type.description: The type of entity for which the payment has been made. Available types: 'Meeting', 'EventAttendance', 'Invoice', 'ClientBookingPackage', 'ProductOrder'.

staff_id.description: Default is set to the staff that performed the API call. Business owner is allowed to send staff_id

state.description: The current payment state. This field can be used only for creating a pending payment. Value can be only 'pending'

post.description:
## Overview
Create New Payment. Available for **Staff, App, and Directory tokens**.

## Prerequisites
The business must have the `payments_module` feature enabled to use this endpoint.

get.description:
## Overview
Get Payment by ID. Available for **Staff Tokens**.

## Prerequisites
The business must have the `payments_module` feature enabled.

matter_uid.description: The matter uid of the relevant payment. **Important**: The matter_uid must match the conversation_id of the specified payment. The payment must have been created within the context of this matter. If mismatched, the API will return 'Payment does not belong to matter' error.

payment_status_uid.description: The uid of the relevant payment request to match

post.description:
## Overview
Match Payment Available for **Staff, App, and Directory tokens**.

parameters.description: Filter by created_at, updated_at, state. state values: issued, draft, declined. available operators for created_at and updated_at: gt, gte, lt, lte, eq. available operators for state: in. example: filter[created_at][gt]=2019-01-01, filter[state][in]=issued,draft
parameters.name: filter

parameters.description: Sort by one of the following: created_at, updated_at, state. available operators: asc, desc. example: sort=created_at:asc,updated_at:desc
parameters.name: sort

get.description:
## Overview
Get Invoices List. Available for **Staff Tokens**.

allow_online_payment.description: true, false, default: true if the business is connected to payment provider

due_date.description: invoice due ,must be later than issued_at

rate.description: invoice item tax rate in percentages

post.description:
## Overview
Create New Invoice Available for **Staff, App, and Directory tokens**.

client_id.description: The client UID (unique identifier) for the client who owns this card.

customer_id.description: Required. The customer ID from the payment gateway (e.g., Stripe customer ID starting with 'cus_'). This is the external identifier used by the payment provider.

default.description: true/false. default: false (will be set to true if it is the client's first card)

external_card_id.description: Required. The card ID from the payment gateway (e.g., Stripe card ID starting with 'card_' or 'pm_'). This is mandatory for sync operations.

post.description:
## Overview
Create sync card Available for **Staff, App, and Directory tokens**.

## Required Fields
- `customer_id`: The customer ID from the payment gateway (e.g., Stripe customer ID). This is mandatory - the API returns 422 'Mandatory parameter customer_id is missing' when it's not provided.
- `client_id`: The client UID to associate the card with.
- `external_card_id`: The card ID from the payment gateway.

delete.description:
## Overview
Delete saved card Available for **Staff, App, and Directory tokens**.

put.description:
## Overview
Update a checkout process from webhook Available for **Staff, App, and Directory tokens**.

## Important
This is a webhook endpoint designed to be called by external payment providers (Stripe, etc.) after checkout completion. The `url_key` must be from an active checkout session (PaymentProcessRequest), not a payment request UID.

amount.description: The charged amount  (You should send this only if you are in sync_flow)

card.description: The saved card info - (You should send this only if client want to save the card)

card_id.description: The card id - should be unique value

customer_id.description: The customer unique id (You should send this only if client want to save the card)

fees.description: Array of fees (Max 1 fee) (Relevant only for when sync_flow is not true)

payment_method.description: The payment method which was used in checkout. Available methods: 'Credit Card', 'Bank Payment - ACH'.

ps_id.description: The payment status uid (You should send this only if you are in sync_flow)

state.description: The current payment state. This field can be used only for creating a pending payment. Value can be only 'pending'

sync_flow.description: You should send true in case it is a post checkout flow

tips.description: Array of tips (Max 1 tip) (Relevant only for when sync_flow is not true)

transaction_id.description: The external payment gateway transaction id

url_key.description: The url_key from an active checkout session (PaymentProcessRequest). This is NOT the payment request UID - it's a unique key generated when the checkout session is created.

get.summary: Get Open Checkout For Specific url_key
get.description:
## Overview
Get Open Checkout For Specific url_key.

valid_from.description: First valid date of the client package (ISO 8601 format)

valid_until.description: Last valid date of the client package (ISO 8601 format). Default: will be set according to package expiration.

post.description:
## Overview
Add package to client [Alpha] Available for **Staff, App, and Directory tokens**.

put.description:
## Overview
Cancel Client Package Credit Redemption [Alpha] Available for **Staff, App, and Directory tokens**.

matter_uid.description: Matter/Conversation UID. If not provided, the system will attempt to find the default matter for the client.

200.description: Client package credit updated using payment_status_id

post.description:
## Overview
Use Client Package Credit [Alpha] Available for **Staff, App, and Directory tokens**.

parameters.description: if exists the packages returns with their items
parameters.name: include_items

parameters.description: if exists the packages returns only active packages
parameters.name: active_only

200.description: Packages Info Retrieved with active packages only

get.description:
## Overview
Get all package of business. Available for **Staff Tokens**.

post.description:
## Overview
Create a package and its corresponding items Available for **Staff, App, and Directory tokens**.

discount_amount.description: Package discount amount (Only for view purposes)

discount_unit.description: Package discount unit [F-Fixed, P-Percentage] (Only for view purposes)

expiration.description: Once package is instanced for a client, it will be valid for expiration number X expiration unit

expiration_unit.description: The expiration unit (M-Month, D-Day, W-Week, Y-Year)

total_bookings.description: Usage number allowed for specific item within the package

products.description: Products included in the package. Up to 3 different products allowed. **Must be an empty array `[]` if no products are included - do NOT pass null or omit this field.**

quantity.description: Product's quantity, must be greater than 0, up to 5 items allowed.

get.description:
## Overview
Show package info. Available for **Staff Tokens**.

discount_amount.description: Package discount amount (Only for view purposes)

discount_unit.description: Package discount unit [F-Fixed, P-Percentage] (Only for view purposes)

expiration.description: Once package is instanced for a client, it will be valid for expiration number X expiration unit

expiration_unit.description: The expiration unit (M-Month, D-Day, W-Week, Y-Year)

total_bookings.description: Usage number allowed for specific item within the package

products.description: Package's products. **Use empty array `[]` to remove products or if no products are included - do NOT pass null.**

quantity.description: Product's quantity, must be greater than 0, up to 5 items allowed.

put.description:
## Overview
Update package [Alpha] Available for **Staff, App, and Directory tokens**.

get.description:
## Overview
Get Current Payment Settings. Available for **Staff Tokens**.

allow_bank_debit_on_checkout.description: Enables ACH/bank debit for client checkout.

allow_express_wallets.description: Enables digital wallet payments (Google Pay, Apple Pay, etc.).

allow_view_payments.description: Allows SMB clients to view payment history in their portal. Set true/false.

client_store_card_for_business_use.description: Allows businesses to charge a card that was saved by the client for future use. Set true/false.

enable_tips_for_bo.description: Enables tips on back office charges created by SMB. Set true/false.

enable_tips_for_cp.description: Enables client tips during Client Portal checkout. Set true/false.

multiple_currencies.description: Enables multi-currency support for businesses serving international clients. Set true/false.

surcharge_fee_enabled.description: Read-only field indicating if credit card surcharges are enabled for this SMB.

surcharge_fee_rate.description: Read-only field. Current credit card surcharge rate for SMB cost recovery (e.g., 2.9).

convenience_fee_value.description: Fee amount (e.g., 2.50 flat or 1.0%). Required if "convenience_fee".

payments_enabled.description: Enables/disables online payments for SMBs. Set to true to activate, false to disable.

payments_gateway_type.description: Active gateway provider type, for example "vcitaPayments", "stripe", "square", "ThryvPay", "paypal".

paypal_email.description: Paypal account connection email used by the SMB for Paypal integration.

stripe_access_token.description: [STRIPE] Stripe access token. Required when using Stripe gateway.

stripe_email.description: [STRIPE] Stripe account connection email used by the SMB for Stripe integration.

stripe_user_id.description: [STRIPE] Stripe account ID (format: "acct_..."). Required for Stripe.

terms_and_conditions_value.description: URL or text content for client terms and conditions.

tips.description: Preset tip options. Send empty [] to use defaults (15%, 20%, 25%); otherwise exactly 3 items.

post.description:
## Overview
Update Payment Settings Available for **Staff, App, and Directory tokens**.

put.description:
## Overview
Update Default Currency Available for **Staff, App, and Directory tokens**.

## Overview
Apply Coupon Available for **Staff, App, and Directory tokens**.

get.description:
## Overview
Validate Coupon. Available for **Staff, App, and Directory tokens**.

## Required Parameters
- `coupon_code` (query parameter): The coupon code to validate.

## Validation Rules
The coupon must meet all of the following criteria to be valid:
- Active status (not disabled)
- Not expired (within valid date range)
- Not already redeemed by this payment status
- Valid for the entity types in the payment

## Overview
Get services list. Available for **Staff Tokens**.

## Parameters
Note: The `business_id` parameter should contain the business UID (unique identifier like '88pzdbz1hmkdoel4'), not the numeric database ID.

parameters.description: How many items to return per page. Default: 25. Max: 100
parameters.name: per_page

services.name: Phone/online web design consultation
services.description: Experience personalized design solutions with our Phone/Online Web Design Consultation service! Our expert designers will provide tailored advice and guidance to elevate your brand's online presence. Benefit from cost-effective consultations that align with your design vision. Book your consultation today at here.

get.description:
## Overview
Get services availability.

## Required Parameters
Either `service_ids` OR `id` must be provided. These parameters are mutually exclusive - use one or the other.

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of service UIDs. Either `service_ids` OR `id` must be provided (mutually exclusive).
parameters.name: service_ids

parameters.description: Single service UID. Either `service_ids` OR `id` must be provided (mutually exclusive).
parameters.name: id
